amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: amendments numbered 10, 11, 23, 28, 30, 31, 32, 35, 36, 37, 38, 40, 41, 42, 47, 48, 49, 50, 53, 56, and 58 printed in House Report 111-182.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the list of amendments submitted by the Chairman offered en bloc: amendments numbered 10, 11, 23, 28, 30, 31, 32, 35, 36, 37, 38, 40, 41, 42, 47, 48, 49, 50, 53, 56, and 58 printed in House Report 111-182.

action.text: On agreeing to the Skelton amendments (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
